article.title: Japan and the mystery of their Geishas
article.body: Beyond the temples, the millenary culture and the many traditions, Japan is a country of mysteries and the Geishas are one of those well-kept secrets that everyone speaks and few know. We will walk through the narrow streets of Kyoto and enter the mystical world of these muses of Japanese art and culture.

article.title: Thailand among their temples, smiling people, massages and street food.
article.body: Thailand is a Southeast Asian country. It's known for tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins and ornate temples displaying figures of Buddha. In Bangkok, the capital, an ultramodern cityscape rises next to quiet canalside communities and the iconic temples of Wat Arun, Wat Pho and the Emerald Buddha Temple (Wat Phra Kaew).
